ovdesc.p: This table will get updated by a cob job on a daily basis if AA account goes overdraft.

desc.p: Should be a Valid T24 Account record
This field will get updated with the date on a daily basis, if the account is overdraft.
This field will maintain the count of total number of times the account is on overdraft.
This field is used to indicate that the amount which is next available to the customer. It will get cleared on a daily basis in a cob job.
